title: Why cannot my phone be found by other phones?
answer:
l   Bluetooth is disabled. 


 Solution: Touch **Settings** and enable **Bluetooth**. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45367) 


 l   The phone is set to **Not visible to other Bluetooth devices** though Bluetooth is enabled. 

 Solution: Touch **Settings** > **Bluetooth** and then touch the device name. 

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=45371)
